Trade/Device Name(s): ACCU-CHEK Performa Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Specimen Type(s): Fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACCU-CHEK Performa Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood using amperometric detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in venous or fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertips; for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings to aid monitoring effectiveness of glucose control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
